Text: Pemex Guaranty Enron Cc Dear Lucy Our financial council considers that there should be no problem to include your comments in the guaranty form although it has to be authorized by the corporate council We are currently working on that authorization and will let you know as soon as we have an answer Best regards Martha Navarro Original Message From LucyOrtiz mailto Sent Lunes de Agosto de pm To Martha NavarroMaldonado Alejandro ReyesVentura Cc LucyOrtiz CraigBreslau MarieHeard Subject FW Pemex Guaranty Importance High Martha Alex De acuerdo a su solicitud anexo les envio los comentarios de Enron sobre la garantia Les agradezco su pronta respuesta Estoy a sus ordenes para cualquier commentario al respecto Lucy Ortiz Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Tuesday August AM To mmax Cc Breslau Craig Ortiz Lucy Subject FW Pemex Guaranty Importance High Ms Marquez I am following up regarding the status of our comments to the form of guaranty for Pemex that you provided to Lucy Ortiz Please do not hesitate to contact either Francisco PintoLeite or me with any questions or comments We look forward to hearing your comments Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Monday July AM To mmax Cc Vanek Darren Ortiz Lucy Breslau Craig Leite Francisco Pinto Subject Pemex Guaranty Importance High Ms Marquez Attached are an original and blacklined copy of your form of guaranty which reflect our comments Please do not hesitate to contact either Francisco PintoLeite Senior Counsel or me with any questions or comments Thank you for your assistance Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax pemexguarantydoc PEMEXGUARANTYREDDOC This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you WINMAILDAT

RE Pemex Guaranty EnronThanks for your comments I will let you know our lawyers reaction to your explanatiion to point Best regards Martha Navarro Original Message From MarieHeard mailto Sent Viernes de Septiembre de pm To Martha NavarroMaldonado Subject FW Pemex Guaranty Enron Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Friday September PM To ENRON Cc Breslau Craig Ortiz Lucy Subject RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Ms Navarro Thank you for sending your comments to the guaranty Please note our comments below Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom NRONcom Sent Friday September AM To Breslau Craig Ortiz Lucy Heard Marie Cc Subject Pemex Guaranty Enron Lucy Following please find our Corporate Lawyers comments to the changes you requested to the Guaranty we are working on Recitals We do not see why it would be necessary to add that The Guarantor will directly or indirectly benefit from the Transactions between the Beneficiary and PMI Please explain Heard Marie Because i it is a correct statement and ii it clarifies the element of consideration which is essential for purposes of enforceability Section Considering that Pemex normally needs business days to request funds in foreing currencies to the Central Bank we need to change the payment date to be Business Days after receipt of the Payment Demand instead of days Heard Marie We are okay with this change Section Jurisdiction We think that New York Jurisdiction is a good option and probably the most experienced in terms of derivatives trading and therefore we prefer to keep the exclusive jurisdiction of any federal court sitting in the Borough of Manhattan Heard Marie We are okay with the exclusive jurisdiction The rest of your comments are acceptable to us Carlos Riveroll will be sending you PMIs comments to the amendment to the MSA so we can finalize this as soon as posible Best regards Martha Navarro WINMAILDAT RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Cc Marie Our Corporate Lawyers just agreed to your suggested addition to the Recitals Section In order to be able to execute the Guaranty we need the final blessing of Hacienda which should be no problem and is already in process Carlos Riveroll contacting you to reach an agreement regarding the Amendment to the MSA to incorporate the Guaranty In the mean time we will prepare the execution copyes be ready to sign it Best regards Martha Navarro Original Message From MarieHeard mailto Sent Viernes de Septiembre de pm To IMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom Cc CraigBreslau LucyOrtiz Subject RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Ms Navarro Thank you for sending your comments to the guaranty Please note our comments below Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom NRONcom Sent Friday September AM To Breslau Craig Ortiz Lucy Heard Marie Cc Subject Pemex Guaranty Enron Lucy Following please find our Corporate Lawyers comments to the changes you requested to the Guaranty we are working on Recitals We do not see why it would be necessary to add that The Guarantor will directly or indirectly benefit from the Transactions between the Beneficiary and PMI Please explain Heard Marie Because i it is a correct statement and ii it clarifies the element of consideration which is essential for purposes of enforceability Section Considering that Pemex normally needs business days to request funds in foreing currencies to the Central Bank we need to change the payment date to be Business Days after receipt of the Payment Demand instead of days Heard Marie We are okay with this change Section Jurisdiction We think that New York Jurisdiction is a good option and probably the most experienced in terms of derivatives trading and therefore we prefer to keep the exclusive jurisdiction of any federal court sitting in the Borough of Manhattan Heard Marie We are okay with the exclusive jurisdiction The rest of your comments are acceptable to us Carlos Riveroll will be sending you PMIs comments to the amendment to the MSA so we can finalize this as soon as posible Best regards Martha Navarro WINMAILDAT File WINMAILDAT This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you WINMAILDAT

RE Pemex Guaranty EnronMarie Pemex will by signing the guaranty that will be either Juan Jos Suarez CFO or Jorge Lanz Managing Director of Finance They will be able to sign it once we get the final blessing from the Ministry of Finance they have to confirm that the guaranty does not represent contingent public debt and therefore it does not require registration with Hacienda We are checking everyday to make this happen as soon as possible The guaranty cannot be dated as of January as we got the authorization from the Board in July this year and we also need this confirmatin from Hacienda to be prior to its execution As soon as we have it signed I will send you a fax and the hard copy will follow I will keep you posted Martha Original Message From MarieHeard mailto Sent Jueves de Septiembre de am To Martha NavarroMaldonado Subject FW Pemex Guaranty Enron Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Thursday September AM To Cc Williams Jason R Credit Subject RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Martha Thanks for getting the changes to the form of guaranty approved Will you please have the guaranty dated effective as of January Also who will be the party signing the guaranty and when can we expect to receive the signed guaranty In addition when the guaranty has been signed on your part will you please fax a copy to me at Again thank you for your assistance on this Marie Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom NRONcom Sent Tuesday September PM To Breslau Craig Ortiz Lucy Heard Marie Cc Subject RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Marie Our Corporate Lawyers just agreed to your suggested addition to the Recitals Section In order to be able to execute the Guaranty we need the final blessing of Hacienda which should be no problem and is already in process Carlos Riveroll contacting you to reach an agreement regarding the Amendment to the MSA to incorporate the Guaranty In the mean time we will prepare the execution copyes be ready to sign it Best regards Martha Navarro Original Message From MarieHeard mailto Sent Viernes de Septiembre de pm To IMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom Cc CraigBreslau LucyOrtiz Subject RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Ms Navarro Thank you for sending your comments to the guaranty Please note our comments below Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom NRONcom Sent Friday September AM To Breslau Craig Ortiz Lucy Heard Marie Cc Subject Pemex Guaranty Enron Lucy Following please find our Corporate Lawyers comments to the changes you requested to the Guaranty we are working on Recitals We do not see why it would be necessary to add that The Guarantor will directly or indirectly benefit from the Transactions between the Beneficiary and PMI Please explain Heard Marie Because i it is a correct statement and ii it clarifies the element of consideration which is essential for purposes of enforceability Section Considering that Pemex normally needs business days to request funds in foreing currencies to the Central Bank we need to change the payment date to be Business Days after receipt of the Payment Demand instead of days Heard Marie We are okay with this change Section Jurisdiction We think that New York Jurisdiction is a good option and probably the most experienced in terms of derivatives trading and therefore we prefer to keep the exclusive jurisdiction of any federal court sitting in the Borough of Manhattan Heard Marie We are okay with the exclusive jurisdiction The rest of your comments are acceptable to us Carlos Riveroll will be sending you PMIs comments to the amendment to the MSA so we can finalize this as soon as posible Best regards Martha Navarro WINMAILDAT File WINMAILDAT This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole Pemex Guaranty Enron Cc Lucy Following please find our Corporate Lawyers comments to the changes you requested to the Guaranty we are working on Recitals We do not see why it would be necessary to add that The Guarantor will directly or indirectly benefit from the Transactions between the Beneficiary and PMI Please explain Section Considering that Pemex normally needs business days to request funds in foreing currencies to the Central Bank we need to change the payment date to be Business Days after receipt of the Payment Demand instead of days Section Jurisdiction We think that New York Jurisdiction is a good option and probably the most experienced in terms of derivatives trading and therefore we prefer to keep the exclusive jurisdiction of any federal court sitting in the Borough of Manhattan The rest of your comments are acceptable to us Carlos Riveroll will be sending you PMIs comments to the amendment to the MSA so we can finalize this as soon as posible Best regards Martha Navarro WINMAILDAT
